name: Derpy Deep Drive
description:
Description

Derpy Deep Drive is a 3D Endless* Driving game.

In this endless* driving game, How far can you drive your School Bus?

  • Single Endless* Mode.
  • Maneuver around obstacles to avoid getting damaged.
  • Hit an Obstacle? don't worry your bus is more durable than you think. But how many hit's can it take?
  • Let's see your amazing Bus Driving skills.
  • Made for Ludum Dare 48.
  • This game might not be balanced at all.
  • If the game is lagging, reduce the graphics quality using the in-game settings menu.
  • *It's supposed to be an endless mode, but it's not actually endless.
Controls 🖱️

Mouse

Bug/Fixes Bugs :
  • Score, speed and health not resetting after game over.
Fixes :
  • Fixed Score, speed and health not getting reset after game over.
  • Disabled an unintentional Jump functionality
Engine Unreal Engine 4 Credits
  • Music from [ZapSplat.com](https://www.zapsplat.com/)
